attributes.action: stop apologising for past deeds of this country and tell people to get over it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this country at present seems to be forever saying sorry for events which were carried out by our ancestors, it is about time people of today stop whining about things which happened( and had nothing to do with any person living today) in this countrys name ages ago. my family came over two hundred years ago from ireland, and i am english ,although perhaps i should make a claim from our country from back then for the anguish my ancestors suffered.GET OVER these things
